p: The immunomodulatory activity of ACA (0.01, 0.1, 1 and 10 μg/well) was assessed in RAW264.7 cell and rat peritoneal macrophages. Results showed that ACA induced pro-inflammatory cytokines such as TNF-α and IL-12 and enhanced the proliferation of murine thymocytes and the expression of IFN-γ and IL-2; however, ACA caused no effect on proliferation of B cell-enriched rat splenocytes (Prasanna and Venkatesh 2015).
